file_insights.purpose: Page wrapper component for the approval queue feature
key_components: PageHeader - displays title, subtitle, and breadcrumbs
ApprovalQueueList - main list component for displaying approval requests
file_insights.structure: Functional component using MUI Box for layout with padding

patterns_discovered.description: Top-level page components composed of PageHeader, Card containers, and feature-specific child components
patterns_discovered.evidence: ApprovalQueuePage structure follows standard pattern of header → card → content

patterns_discovered.description: Handler functions with TODO comments indicating planned navigation functionality
patterns_discovered.evidence: handleViewDetails function with comment about future react-router-dom navigation

patterns_discovered.description: Handler functions typed with specific domain types (ApprovalRequest) passed from child components
Using 'void approval' to suppress unused variable warnings while maintaining function signature

gotchas_discovered.description: handleViewDetails handler is defined but not fully implemented - navigation logic commented out
gotchas_discovered.impact: Button clicks may not produce expected navigation until implementation is completed
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Comment clearly documents the future implementation requirement

gotchas_discovered.description: Using 'void approval' to suppress TypeScript unused variable warning
gotchas_discovered.impact: If handleViewDetails logic is removed completely, the parameter becomes truly unused
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Pattern is acceptable as placeholder until full implementation

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created the ApprovalQueuePage wrapper component as a thin container combining UI layout components (PageHeader, Card) with the ApprovalQueueList feature component
approach_outcome.completeness: Page structure is complete with proper composition; navigation handler is stubbed for future implementation
approach_outcome.code_quality: Well-structured, properly typed with TypeScript, follows project conventions for page components

recommendations.suggestion: Complete the handleViewDetails function to integrate react-router-dom navigation when approval details page is ready
recommendations.rationale: Currently the handler does nothing, making the onViewDetails callback non-functional

recommendations.suggestion: Verify ApprovalRequest type is properly exported from ../types module
recommendations.rationale: Ensures type safety and prevents import errors at runtime

recommendations.suggestion: Consider adding role attributes or semantic HTML if PageHeader doesn't already include them
recommendations.rationale: Breadcrumbs and page headers should have proper ARIA roles for screen readers
